target: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_SEQ_00<tab>アサー天空廊のモグーグは、ソワソワしている。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_SEQ_01<tab>Mogeuge has heard the characteristic clicking of crackleweed seedlings drifting on the wind from the lands below his lookout point. Though he is glad to know the plants still survive in the scorched soil of the Four Arms, he fears for their chances of thriving. To secure their survival, he bids you collect five of the seedlings and deliver them to Moggzia, head gardener of Moghome, to be replanted in kinder climes.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_SEQ_01<tab>モグーグの話を聞いた。フォーアームズにたくさんの新芽が出てきているらしい。ドラヴァニア雲海のフォーアームズにある「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AED01 /var>」を5個入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_SEQ_02<tab>You successfully collect five crackleweed seedlings from the Four Arms. Travel to Moghome to deliver them into Moggzia's green-fingered paws.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AED01 /var>を入手した。ドラヴァニア雲海のモグモグホーム付近にいる「モグシア」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_SEQ_03<tab>You deliver the seedlings to Moggzia, who agrees to replant them in his hilltop haven. Since Nidhogg's roar drove the dragons into a frenzy, the scalekins' wanton acts of destruction have brought much of the local flora to the brink of extinction. But as long as moogles like Moggzia are around, the plants and flowers of the Churning Mists have a fighting chance of thriving in pastures new.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_SEQ_03<tab>モグシアに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AED01 /var>を渡した。ドラゴン族が殺気立ってから、植物が荒らされることが増えて困ってるらしい。モグシアたちは、植物を護りたいと思っているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the crackleweed seedlings to Moggzia.

TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGEUGE_000_000<tab>Do you hear that snapping noise, adventurer? It's the cry of a crackleweed, kupo! Several new seedlings have taken root in the Four Arms, but the poor little things won't last for long in those dragon-infested lands. We have to move them somewhere they'll be taken care of!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGEUGE_000_000フォーアームズに、たくさん新芽が出てたくぽ。
でも、あの場所じゃ、きっと枯れちゃうくぽ。
新芽は、ちゃんとしたところで、大切に育てたいくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGEUGE_000_001<tab>Could I ask you to dig up five of the seedlings and take them over to Moggzia, kupo? He's the moogle in charge of the garden above Moghome. If anyone can find those poor little seedlings a good home, he can.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGEUGE_000_001フォーアームズから「」を5つ、
持ってきてほしいくぽ！
そして、モグモグホームの「モグシア」に届けてほしいくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGEUGE_000_010<tab>The Four Arms is no place for a crackleweed, kupo. If they aren't moved to a new home soon, they'll waste away! I'd be ever so grateful if you could dig the seedlings up and take them over to Moggzia. He'll know what to do with them.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGEUGE_000_010フォーアームズから「」を5つ、
持ってきてほしいくぽ！
そして、モグモグホームの「モグシア」に届けてほしいくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGEUGE_000_020<tab>Did you find the crackleweed seedlings, kupo? Then take them back to Moghome right away! Don't worry, little seedlings─Moggzia will find a nice place for you in his garden!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGEUGE_000_020フォーアームズから「」を5つ、
持ってきてほしいくぽ！
そして、モグモグホームの「モグシア」に届けてほしいくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGGZIA_000_031<tab>Mogeuge sent these seedlings to be replanted? Well, all right. I'm sure I can find a place for them somewhere.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGGZIA_000_031モグーグからの伝言くぽ？
わかったくぽ、この苗は、ちゃんとここで育てるくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGGZIA_000_032<tab>Ever since the dragons went round the twist, their lands have fallen into wrack and ruin, and a lot of the native plants have been lost in the process. But as long as we moogles live and breathe, the flowers will always find a friend in us, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ509_01844_MOGGZIA_000_032ドラゴン族が殺気立ってから、
植物たちが荒らされることも増えているくぽ。
モグたちが、こうやって護ってあげたいくぽ！
